entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
